Node.definition: = referent to the time after the event in focus
= causative action by which human or deities produce an object, either personally or by others on behalf of them
= man; ◄ son of David (דָּוִד) ► attempted to become king in his father's place but was killed in the attempt
= open vehicle with two or four wheels, pulled by one or more horses; ◄ made or wood and iron; ► used in war or for travelling

= large domesticated solid hoofed quadruped; stockily built in comparison to today's horses, with shorter heads and thicker necks; about 122–142 cm tall, and 2.1 m long; its coat varies from dark to pale brown; it eats plants; ◄ Equus caballus; ► used in battle, both to ride and for pulling chariots; ≈ symbolic of military might; associated with the sun, which was said to ride across the sky in a chariot
= state in which a countable entity is fifty in number
= man; ◄ son of David (דָּוִד) ► attempted to become king in his father's place but was killed in the attempt
literally: hand; hence: = pertaining to the location to the left or right of an object ◄ analogous to the location of someone's hands or arms

= an open space connecting different places, ► used for travelling and transportation; ≈ often extended to denote our life as a journey from birth to death, and the totality of our activities during our lives
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

Node.gloss: dispute, quarrel, strife, argument|(law)suit, case, indictment
Node.definition: = state of opposition or hostility between two or more persons, perhaps even involving a deity
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity
= event where a dispute between two parties is settle by a judge
= action by which humans or deities speak with a loud voice, often to draw attention to themselves or to their situation and expecting someone to respond in one way or another
= man; ◄ son of David (דָּוִד) ► attempted to become king in his father's place but was killed in the attempt

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

= referent to an unknown location; ► normally used with the purpose of finding out from which location a person or object originates; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that location does not exist

= relatively large and permanent population center, usually surrounded by a wall and surrounded by a number of dependent villages (חָצֵר) settlements (בַּת) and pasturelands (מִגְרָשׁ) ≈ associated with strength and security
= referent to a male participant that is addressed in a discourse

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= state in which a countable entity is one in number
= group of clans (מִשְׁפָּחָה) united by a common leader

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter

= man who is under the authority of someone else as that person's legal property, employee, subject, or vassal; or someone who presents himself as such when speaking to someone of importance or praying to God

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= man; ◄ son of David (דָּוִד) ► attempted to become king in his father's place but was killed in the attempt

= process or action by which living creatures perceive something, primarily though not necessarily exclusively with their eyes, either as a spontaneous incident or as the result of focusing the eyes on something
= state in which events are well performed, morally and ethically correct, and beneficial to others

Node.gloss: there is not|it is not|it does not
Node.definition: = state in which an object or event is either absent or non existant
particle linking two entities and denoting that X and Y function as one single entity in the proposition in focus
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity

Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= man; ◄ son of David (דָּוִד) ► attempted to become king in his father's place but was killed in the attempt

= a reference to an unknown person or deity; normally used with the purpose of identifying that person or deity; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that person or deity cannot be identified

Node.gloss: to place (in a position) > to appoint
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans or deities give (other) humans a certain task or responsibility

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

Node.gloss: dispute, quarrel, strife, argument|(law)suit, case, indictment
Node.definition: = state of opposition or hostility between two or more persons, perhaps even involving a deity
= a situation where one party has a dispute with another party, and is looking for a legal ruling in which they receive what they consider to be rightfully theirs
= causative action by which humans or deities declare (other) humans to conform to an accepted code of behavior

Node.gloss: to approach|to come near|to come forward
Node.definition: = action by which humans or animals move to a location relatively close to the location in focus
= action by which humans lay themselves down on the ground in front of another human or a deity, ► as an act of submission or respect

Node.gloss: to stretch out (one's) hand|to stretch out (one's) right hand|to lay (one's) hand
Node.definition: = action by which humans stretch out their hand, right hand, or finger in order to do point with it or to put it in position for another action

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

= the lower part of the upper limb of the human body, which in some contexts may include the full arm, ► apart from basic human activities such as holding, giving and taking, working, beating, also used in rituals around blessings, oaths, and prayer; ≈ used figuratively in expressions involving strength, control, responsibility, punishment; ≈ possibly used as a euphemism for the male genitals

Node.gloss: to seize|to hold|to take hold|to grasp|to handle
Node.definition: = action by which humans take hold of other humans or objects with their hands; the agent role is often extended figuratively to include objects, deities and certain conditions

= action with which a person touches her or his lips to another person (usually on the lips or cheek or hand) or to an object ► to show love or respect or devotion; also used when greeting and saying goodbye

particle linking two entities and denoting that X and Y function as one single entity in the proposition in focus
= marker indicating that the event in focus has to be true before another event can take place

= relatively large and permanent population center, usually surrounded by a wall and surrounded by a number of dependent villages (חָצֵר) settlements (בַּת) and pasturelands (מִגְרָשׁ) ≈ associated with strength and security
literally: to turn; hence: = action by which animals, humans, or deities move back to a location where they have been before

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= man; ◄ son of David (דָּוִד) ► attempted to become king in his father's place but was killed in the attempt

= man who is under the authority of someone else as that person's legal property, employee, subject, or vassal; or someone who presents himself as such when speaking to someone of importance or praying to God
= referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity

= man who is under the authority of someone else as that person's legal property, employee, subject, or vassal; or someone who presents himself as such when speaking to someone of importance or praying to God
= direct male progenitor; ► who normally provides protection, care, instruction, and discipline; ≈ is usually regarded with respect and associated with wisdom, security, and comfort
= referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse
= referent pointing to a period or point of time in the distant past
= a reference to the actual time when a particular event takes place
= referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse

= man who is under the authority of someone else as that person's legal property, employee, subject, or vassal; or someone who presents himself as such when speaking to someone of importance or praying to God

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= man; ◄ from Giloh (גִּילֹנִי) ► counselor of king David (דָּוִד)
marker denoting that the truth value of the following statement is under investigation

= man; ◄ son of Ahitub (אֲחִיטוּב) descendent of Aaron (אַהֲרֹן) tribe of Levi (לֵוִי) ► father of Ahimaaz (אֲחִימַעַץ) became high priest (כֹּהֵן) under David (דָּוִד) and Solomon (שְׁלֹמֹה) with the prophet (נָבִיא) Nathan (נָתָן) anointed Solomon as David (דָּוִד)'s successor; officer in charge of his tribe
= man; ◄ son of Ahimelech (אֲחִימֶלֶךְ) ► priest (כֹּהֵן) time of king David (דָּוִד)
= person ordained (מלא) and consecrated (קדשׁ) to perform religious services on behalf of others
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

= construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity

= man; ◄ son of Ahitub (אֲחִיטוּב) descendent of Aaron (אַהֲרֹן) tribe of Levi (לֵוִי) ► father of Ahimaaz (אֲחִימַעַץ) became high priest (כֹּהֵן) under David (דָּוִד) and Solomon (שְׁלֹמֹה) with the prophet (נָבִיא) Nathan (נָתָן) anointed Solomon as David (דָּוִד)'s successor; officer in charge of his tribe
= man; ◄ son of Ahimelech (אֲחִימֶלֶךְ) ► priest (כֹּהֵן) time of king David (דָּוִד)
= person ordained (מלא) and consecrated (קדשׁ) to perform religious services on behalf of others
= state in which a countable entity is two in number
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= man; ◄ son of Zadok (צָדֹוק) tribe of Levi (לֵוִי) ► spied on Absalom (אַבְשָׁלֹום) for David (דָּוִד) together with Jonathan (יְהֹונָתָן) the son of Abiathar (אֶבְיָתָר)

= man; ◄ son of Ahitub (אֲחִיטוּב) descendent of Aaron (אַהֲרֹן) tribe of Levi (לֵוִי) ► father of Ahimaaz (אֲחִימַעַץ) became high priest (כֹּהֵן) under David (דָּוִד) and Solomon (שְׁלֹמֹה) with the prophet (נָבִיא) Nathan (נָתָן) anointed Solomon as David (דָּוִד)'s successor; officer in charge of his tribe
= man; ◄ son of Abiathar (אֶבְיָתָר) tribe of Levi (לֵוִי) ► spied on Absalom (אַבְשָׁלֹום) for David (דָּוִד) together with Ahimaaz (אֲחִימַעַץ) son of Zadok (צָדֹוק)
= man; ◄ son of Ahimelech (אֲחִימֶלֶךְ) ► priest (כֹּהֵן) time of king David (דָּוִד)
= causative action by which humans send a message, (supposedly) in the form of a written document to someone else
literally: by the hand (of someone); hence: = process by which a certain event is carried out by an intermediary (person) or instrument (object)
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= man; ◄ Arkite (אַרְכִּי) ► counselor of king David (דָּוִד)
= someone who has kind regard for and is in friendly relationship with another person
= man; ◄ son of Jesse (יִשַׁי) ► king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)

= relatively large and permanent population center, usually surrounded by a wall and surrounded by a number of dependent villages (חָצֵר) settlements (בַּת) and pasturelands (מִגְרָשׁ) ≈ associated with strength and security
= man; ◄ son of David (דָּוִד) ► attempted to become king in his father's place but was killed in the attempt
= town, formerly referred to as Salem (שָׁלֵם) and Jebus (יְבוּס) located on Mt. Zion (צִיֹּון) territory of Judah (יְהוּדָה) ► conquered by king David (דָּוִד) who made it the capital of his kingdom
